name: Cherry Cake War Angels New Demo
name_original: Cherry Cake War Angels New Demo
description:
The forces from Hell have declared war on  the Holy Kingdom and its up to the soldiers of Her Immaculate Army, the War Angels,  to defeat evil and restore peace! Play as one of HIA's Archangels and shoot your way through enemies, boxes, and even trees, while trying to rescue injured allies and earn your rank as the perfect War Angel. 

* My only playtesters so far have been my darling children, who are ages 4 and 5. If you happen to come across any bugs or oddities, don't hesitate to let me know! Feedback is greatly appreciated!
